q: Andy Coulson . Mr Andy Coulson is to step down amid continuing allegations regarding phone hacking at the News of the World. He has denied knowledge of the practice when he was editor and Mr Nick Clegg said he had no reason to disbelieve him . But Labour's deputy leader Harriet Harman said David Cameron was`` wrong'' to employ him in the first place.
